# VEHICLE::SET_HELI_CAN_PICKUP_ENTITY_THAT_HAS_PICK_UP_DISABLED

## Summary
Entities can now be flagged to prevent them being picked up by the cargobob, setting this flag to true will still allow this cargobob to pick them up

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** canPickUp

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Stops the cargobob from being able to attach any vehicle
